TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaType extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotated

summary.span: 所有簡單型別和複雜型別的基底類別。

span.span: The base class for all simple types and complex types.

remarks.format: ## Examples 請參閱類別和範例中使用這個類別的類別。See the class and the class for an example using this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseSchemaType As Object
public: property System::Object ^ BaseSchemaType { System::Object ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This property has been deprecated. Please use BaseXmlSchemaType property that returns a strongly typed base schema type. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 取得編譯後物件型別或內建 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 資料型別、simpleType 項目或 complexType 項目。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation object type or the built-in XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.

summary.span: 這是後結構描述編譯資訊集屬性。

span.span: This is a post-schema-compilation infoset property.

value.span: 內建 XSD 資料型別、simpleType 項目或 complexType 項目。

span.span: The built-in XSD data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ComplexType 被衍生自的基底值所指定之類型。The complexType is derived from the type specified by the base value. 基底值必須是 QName。The base value must be a QName. > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性已經過時，已被取代屬性。The property is obsolete and has been replaced by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseXmlSchemaType As XmlSchemaType
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaType ^ BaseXmlSchemaType { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得此結構描述型別之基底型別的編譯後值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for the base type of this schema type.

value.span: 物件，表示這個結構描述型別的基底型別。

span.span: An object representing the base type of this schema type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性一律具有值，因為所有的結構描述型別的基底型別。The property always has a value, because all schema types have a base type. 這個值會設定在結構描述編譯時，讓它的後結構描述編譯資訊集的一部分。This value is set upon schema compilation, making it a part of the post-schema-compilation infoset.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Datatype As XmlSchemaDatatype
public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDatatype ^ Datatype { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDatatype ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得複雜型別之資料型別的編譯後值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for the data type of the complex type.
The post-schema-compilation value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DerivedBy As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

summary.span: 取得有關此項目如何從其基底型別衍生的編譯後資訊。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation information on how this element was derived from its base type.
One of the valid values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的值，這個屬性可以包含。The following table shows the values that this property can contain. | 值 value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||未指定衍生方法。No derivation method specified.| ||由替代衍生。Derived by Substitution.| ||利用擴充衍生。Derived by Extension.| ||利用限制衍生。Derived by Restriction.| ||衍生的清單。Derived by List.| ||聯集而衍生。Derived by Union.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod Final { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定型別衍生的 final 屬性，指出是否允許進一步衍生。

span.span: Gets or sets the final attribute of the type derivation that indicates if further derivations are allowed.
One of the valid values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的值，這個屬性可以包含簡單類型。The following table shows the values that this property can contain for simple type. | 值 value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||結構描述會覆寫`blockDefault`設定允許的限制、 擴充功能或進行替代任何衍生。Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| ||不指定任何衍生方法。No derivation method is specified. 這是預設值。This is the default. 衍生規則會從結構描述 blockDefault 設定取用。Derivation rules are taken from the schema blockDefault setting.| ||無法由替代衍生的類型所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| ||無法利用擴充衍生的類型所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| ||無法由限制衍生的類型所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| ||`#all`。`#all`. 無法由任何衍生方法衍生型別所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.| 下表顯示的值，這個屬性可以包含複雜型別。The following table shows the values that this property can contain for complex type. | 值 value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||結構描述會覆寫`blockDefault`設定允許的限制、 擴充功能或進行替代任何衍生。Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| ||不指定任何衍生方法。No derivation method is specified. 這是預設值。This is the default. 從結構描述所衍生規則`blockDefault`設定。Derivation rules are taken from the schema `blockDefault` setting.| ||無法由替代衍生的類型所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| ||無法利用擴充衍生的類型所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| ||無法由限制衍生的類型所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| ||`#all`。`#all`. 無法由任何衍生方法衍生型別所取代。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FinalResolved As XmlSchemaDerivationMethod

summary.span: 取得 屬性的編譯後值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value of the property.
The post-compilation value of the property.

value.span: 預設值為 項目的 屬性值。

span.span: The default is the attribute value of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值表示類型的方式限制時透過限制擴充型別。This value indicates how the type is restricted when the type is extended through restriction. 如果型別標示為`final`，這個類型無法擴充。If the type is marked as `final`, this type cannot be extended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法直接序列化內建型別。You cannot directly serialize the built-in type. 如果您需要序列化的型別，建立新的簡單型別衍生自內建型別，並序列化的簡單類型。If you need to serialize the type, create a new simple type which derives from the built-in type and serialize the simple type. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立類型，並將它新增至結構描述。The following example shows how to create the type and add it to the schema. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlschematype/cs/xmlschematype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlschematype/vb/getbuiltinsimpletype.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定型別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type.
The name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 命名空間規格中所定義的名稱必須是無冒號名稱 (NCName)。The name must be an no-colon name (NCName) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification. 如果指定，名稱必須是唯一所有`simpleType`和`complexType`項目。If specified, the name must be unique among all `simpleType` and `complexType` elements.
